price: 61.Woo maray tama weeloolat weeloysime meqe taamoomih abittot yasissikeeh usun teetî fanah Qalala mara kinnon.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
